DynamicRequirements.instructionsevent: Below are condition lists. If conditions are met on any of the lists then the event can spawn/run.
DynamicRequirements.instructionsitem: Below are condition lists. If conditions are met on any of the lists then the player can use the item.
DynamicRequirements.instructionsnpcfriend: Below are condition lists. If conditions are met on any of the lists then the npc will be friendly/protect the player and cannot be hurt by the player.
DynamicRequirements.instructionsnpcattackonsight: Below are condition lists. If conditions are met on any of the lists player will be attacked on sight.
DynamicRequirements.instructionsnpcdontattackonsight: Below are condition lists. If conditions are met on any of the lists then the player will not be attacked on sight by this npc.
DynamicRequirements.instructionsnpccanbeattacked: Below are condition lists. If there are conditions, and they are not met, then the player will not be able to attack this npc.
DynamicRequirements.instructionsquest: Below are condition lists. If conditions are met on any of the lists then the player can start the quest.
DynamicRequirements.instructionsresource: Below are condition lists. If conditions are met on any of the lists then the player can harvest the resource.
DynamicRequirements.instructionsspell: Below are condition lists. If conditions are met on any of the lists then the player can use cast the spell.
DynamicRequirements.title: Dynamic Requirements

Errors.disconnectedclosing: You have lost connection to the server. The editor will now close.
Errors.disconnectedsave: You have been disconnected from the server! Would you like to export this map before closing this editor?
Errors.importfailed: Cannot import map. Currently selected map is not an Intersect map file or was exported with a different version of the Intersect editor!
Errors.resourcesnotfound: The resources directory could not be found! Intersect will now close.

Login.connected: Connected to server. Ready to login!

Login.gettingstarted:
Getting Started?
        1. Start the Intersect Server
        2. Open the Intersect Client and Create an Account
        3. Login to that account here to start designing your game!
Login.raptr: Please close AMD Gaming Evolved before logging into the Intersect editor.
Login.title: Intersect Editor Login

MapGrid.clearandfetch: Are you sure you want to clear the existing previews and fetch previews for each map on this grid? This could take several minutes based on the number of maps in this grid!
MapGrid.justfetch: Are you sure you want to fetch previews for each map? This could take several minutes based on the number of maps in this grid!
MapGrid.keepmapcache: Use your current settings with the map cache? (No to disable lighting/fogs/other effects)
MapGrid.savescreenshotconfirm: Are you sure you want to save a screenshot of your world to a file? This could take several minutes!
MapGrid.savescreenshotdialogue: Save a screenshot of the world
MapGrid.title: Map Grid
MapGrid.unlinkprompt: Are you sure you want to unlink map {00}?

MapLayers.eventinstructions: Double click a tile on the map to create an event!

TimeEditor.colorpaneldesc: Double click the panel above to change the overlay color.
TimeEditor.ratedesc:
Enter 1 for normal rate of time.
Values larger than one for faster days. 
Values between 0 and 1 for longer days. 
Negative values for time to flow backwards.
TimeEditor.title: Time Editor (Day/Night Settings)
